about_the_game:
Step into the world of Canvas, where you become an artist competing in a prestigious art festival. This digital adaptation of the beloved board game brings the joy of painting to your fingertips.



In Canvas, you combine transparent Art Cards to form beautiful paintings, with each card adding new elements and icons that influence your final score. You’ll need to make strategic choices about which cards to use and how to layer them to maximize your points, covering or revealing icons to meet scoring conditions and earn ribbons. Each combination of cards results in a unique illustration and title for your painting.



The game features stunning artwork on each card, designed to inspire your creativity. While the rules are simple and make Canvas accessible to all players, the strategic depth ensures a challenging experience for seasoned gamers.

FEATURES

• Local multiplayer with friends on the same device (or via Steam Remote Play)
• Solo game

LANGUAGE

English
